Package opennlp.ccg.ngrams

Interface Summary
NgramFilter Interface for objects that filter unhappy n-grams.
Reversible Interface for reversible n-gram classes.
SelfParaphraseBiaser Interface for scoring models that implement a self-paraphrase bias.
 

Class Summary
AAnFilter AN n-gram filter that detects "a" followed by a word beginning with a vowel, or "an" followed by a word beginning with a consonant.
ConditionalProbabilityTable A conditional probability table implemented via a FactoredNgramModelFamily, where probabilities are determined by n-grams of "factors" of a single "word" (whether the pairs of attributes and values have anything to do with words or not).
FactoredNgramModel A scorer for a factored n-gram backoff model.
FactoredNgramModelFamily A scorer consisting of a family of factored n-gram backoff models.
KenNgramModel  
LinearNgramScorerCombo Linear combination of n-gram probability models, interpolated at the word level; can also be used as a feature extractor in a perceptron model.
NgramDiversityPruningStrategy A diversity pruning strategy that defines signs to be notCompellinglyDifferent if the n-1 initial and final words are the same, where n is the n-gram order of interest.
NgramPrecisionModel N-gram precision scoring model, using a linear combination of n-grams with rank order centroid weights, and optionally replacing word forms with their semantic classes.
NgramScorer Super class for n-gram scoring models.
NgramScorer.NgramFloats An ngram data object, for holding the log prob and backoff weight.
RepetitionScorer Scores a sign according to how repetitive its words are given the observed context.
SignScorerInterpolation Linear interpolation of sign scorers, some of which may be feature extractors.
SignScorerProduct Product of sign scorers, some of which may be feature extractors..
SRILM_FactoredScorerMaker A custom scorer maker that builds and loads factored n-gram models using the SRILM toolkit, which must be separately installed.
SRILM_ScorerMaker A custom scorer maker that builds and loads standard n-gram models using the SRILM toolkit, which must be separately installed.
SRILMNgramModel A language model that uses the SRI language modeling toolkit.
StandardNgramModel A scorer for a standard n-gram backoff model.
 

Enum Summary
SRILMNgramModelType Used by SRILMNgramModel to specify the type of language model that should be used.
